name: Stick-Stickem Meteora
effect: [Counter] Up to 1 of your Leader or Character cards gains +4000 power during this battle. Then, K.O. up to 1 of your opponent's rested Characters with a cost of 3 or less.
trigger: [Trigger] K.O. up to 1 of your opponent's rested Characters with a cost of 5 or less.
